mapper.insert: insert into sensingcar(sip, sname, sregistor, soriginalfilename, ssavedfilename, sfilecontent, sdescription) values (#{sip}, #{sname}, #{sregistor}, #{soriginalfilename},#{ssavedfilename},#{sfilecontent},#{sdescription});
mapper.select: select count(*) from sensingcar where sip=#{sip};
